# Steps

-   Install Github Pull Requests VS Code extension

-   In the left-hand sidebar, click on the Github Pull Requests icon

![](images/paste-57.png)

-   Right-click and select "Checkout Pull Request"

    ![](images/paste-58.png)

-   Now your local files will be those of the PR.

-   Run all relevant tests in the test suite.
